def.dt: :a room used for sleeping a house with three bedrooms = a 3-bedroom house a spare/guest bedroom a large master bedroom [=a large bedroom that is the main bedroom in a house]

utxt.un: used in combination a three-bedroomed house

def.dt: :lived in by people who go to another town or city to work They live in a bedroom community [=(Brit) dormitory town] just outside of the city.
:dealing with sexual relationships The play is a bedroom farce about a middle-aged couple. bedroom humor
:showing sexual attraction She looked at him with bedroom eyes.
